name: Tctecno
overview:
Yoursautodialers are leaders in complete call center software solutions and offer the most versatile and result-geared autodialers, automated phone dialers, predictive dialers, IVRs, VOIP and other computer telephony integrated products and service support. Trans Continental Technologies (TCT) is one-stop shop for total call center software and call management hardware. Empowered by experience and innovation Yoursautodialer call center softwares are tailor designed to offer an extra edge of advanced customization and automation. Your challenges fuel TCT call management technology to be more innovative. Give TCT call center softwares to your business & read the benefits

* Automated Qualified Lead Generation.
* More than 10,000 calls using just 1 line.
* More than 30,000 valid calls in a day.
* Employees work for 50 minutes in an hour.
* 300-400% increase in profits.
* Simultaneous management of inbound and outbound calls.
* Decrease in operational and Marketing overheads.
* Freedom from legal concerns by ruling out accidents of calling from DNC list.
* Efficient management of large caller data base.
* Seamless integration with your existing phone system.
